articles.title: AI For Private Equity — The Future Of B2B Distribution
articles.author: Lutz Finger
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing AI-powered solutions to enhance various aspects of B2B distribution. Endeavor uses AI for order entry, Blue Ridge leverages predictive AI for supply chain planning, Kanava provides AI-enhanced sales enablement, and Pimberly applies machine learning for data hygiene. These tools aim to improve customer support, lower service costs, and increase conversion rates.

articles.title: The Switch 2's latest update brings support for two great games.
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching a new console named Switch 2. The details are available in stories posted on Jul 15, 2025.

articles.title: G-DRAGON And LINE FRIENDS Collaborate To Create ‘ZO&FRIENDS'
articles.author: Laura Sirikul
articles.summary: G-DRAGON and LINE FRIENDS are launching a new IP character called 'ZO&FRIENDS'.  LINE FRIENDS will open a ZO&FRIENDS pop-up store this summer in Korea, with plans to roll out the line globally in phases. ZO&FRIENDS will launch in the U.S. in September with products including plushies, key rings, home goods, fashion goods, and more.

articles.title: AI Goes Gadget
articles.author: Charlie Fink
articles.summary: XREAL launched the One Series AR glasses powered by AI and the modular Eye camera with AI features. iFFALCON introduced Mural TV with generative AI for art display. Notta launched Memo, an AI voice recorder. Dreame launched AirPursue PM20 air purifier using AI to detect and direct purified air. Viaim launched RecDot AI earbuds for real-time translation. Sunseeker introduced the X3 Plus, an AI-powered lawn mower. Lepro launched a new line of AI-powered smart lights.

articles.title: 25-year-old follows in his parents footsteps owning his own laundromat
articles.author: Kemberly Richardson
articles.summary: Brandon Hollingsworth opened Don's Laundry on December 31st in Queens Village. Hollingsworth, drawing on his experience helping with his parents' laundromats, aims to cater to customers and expand the business.

articles.title: Marketing Signals Unveils AI Search Optimization Service to Elevate Digital Discoverability
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Marketing Signals has launched its AI Search Optimisation service, which is designed to help brands dominate the AI-powered search landscape. The new service integrates organic search, paid search, and AI-driven discovery to deliver a unified, future-proof strategy. This includes enhanced visibility and brand awareness by targeting users where they naturally discover information.

articles.title: PR Gun Unveils Premium Media: A Game-Changer for Press Release Impact
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: PR Gun has launched Premium Media, a new service designed to enhance the visibility of startups, corporations, and nonprofits. Premium Media offers unparalleled reach through placements on platforms like Yahoo Finance, AP News, and Business Insider. It can be used as a standalone solution or an add-on to existing PR Gun packages to amplify online presence and ensure announcements command attention.

articles.title: The brand-new Laneige x Baskin-Robbins Lip Sleeping Mask smells like the ultimate summertime treat
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Laneige, in collaboration with Baskin-Robbins, has launched a limited-edition Rainbow Sherbert flavored Lip Sleeping Mask. The mask features a sorbet swirl design with raspberry, pineapple, and orange scents, along with a pink ice cream spoon applicator and is available at Sephora and Laneige.com.

articles.title: Collins says solid economy gives Fed time to assess next move
articles.summary: Nvidia is launching its China-specific AI chip, the H20, after the US government approved the sales. Nvidia will require licensing approval to fulfill orders, but the US government has assured licenses will be granted. This decision follows Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang's meeting with President Trump.

articles.title: Microsoft won't tell you how to fix Windows 11's search launcher but I will
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Microsoft offers the PowerToys Command Palette as an alternative to the default Windows 11 search.  Users can download it from the Microsoft Store and configure it with custom shortcuts and settings to improve the search experience. It is also compatible with Windows 10.

articles.title: Chipotle brings back viral avocado-inspired lip stain: Here's how to buy in Michigan
articles.author: Greta Cross
articles.summary: Chipotle, in partnership with Wonderskin, has re-released its "Lipotle" burrito-proof lip stain for a limited time, starting July 15. The avocado-inspired lip stain, priced at $29, is available exclusively on the Wonderskin website.

articles.title: NFL world reacts to Chargers' new alternate uniforms
articles.author: Gavino Borquez
articles.summary: The Los Angeles Chargers released new alternate uniforms on Tuesday. The all-yellow design received mixed reviews, while the all-navy design was highly praised. Fan and public reactions on X (formerly Twitter) followed the release of these new uniform sets.

articles.title: NFL world reacts to Chargers' new alternate uniforms
articles.author: Chargers Wire
articles.summary: The Los Angeles Chargers released new alternate uniforms on Tuesday. The all-yellow look received mixed reviews, while the all-navy look received rave reviews.

articles.title: BMG unveils AI-powered marketing tool to accelerate SME growth across Africa
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Best Marketing Gigs (BMG) has launched BMG Ai, an AI-powered marketing tool designed for SMEs in Africa. BMG Ai generates custom marketing roadmaps for brand growth, lead generation, and sales. The tool is currently offered for free, and aims to democratize access to professional marketing for entrepreneurs.

articles.title: Orangekloud Signs Strategic MOU Valued at US$390,000 for AI Collaboration with Meyzer360 Holdings Pte. Ltd.  Jul. 15, 2025 20:30
articles.summary: Orangekloud will deploy its AI platform capabilities under Meyzer360's brand for its client base. Meyzer360 will distribute Orangekloud's eMOBIQ® AI solutions, especially in overseas markets, focusing on SMEs and corporations in industries like Food Services & Manufacturing, Precision Engineering, and Construction.

articles.title: This is the most wholesome use of smart glasses
articles.summary: Even Realities' Even G1 smart glasses offer features such as live translation, on-screen navigation, and notifications. These smart glasses aim to combine smartphone utility with the convenience of wearable technology.

articles.title: Slate360 Provides Insights on Innovations in Tradeshow Booth Design from Concept to Approved Design with AI as a Copilot
articles.summary: Slate360 is embracing AI to enhance its creative process, work more efficiently, and collaborate more effectively with clients in booth design. By using AI tools, Slate360 accelerates ideation, giving clients more time to consider a wider array of concepts for tradeshows, resulting in better solutions.

articles.title: ‘Galaxy has played huge role in advancing Android as a whole': Samsung's Sally Jeong on partnership with Google
articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.summary: Samsung launched Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7 featuring One UI 8 and Android 16. These devices incorporate Gemini AI capabilities and build upon existing foldable features like multi-window and flex mode. Additionally, features like Now Bar, initially introduced on the Galaxy S25, are now integrated into Android 16.

articles.title: See all 11 of the Iowa State Fair 2025 new foods semifinalists
articles.summary: The Iowa State Fair 2025 featured 11 new food semi-finalists, including dishes from vendors like JR's SouthPork Ranch, Iowa Pork Producers Tent, Applishus, Whatcha Smoking' BBQ, HoQ, Over the Top, What's Your Cheez, Wiseguys wood fired pizza, Dairy Zone, Winn and Sara's Kitchen and GoldenKDog. These included items like the Chicken Pickle Ranch Rocket on a Stick and the Hawaiian Hog, representing the introduction of new culinary creations.

articles.title: Your best hair day yet: Meet the NEW powder-to-cream eco-friendly conditioner that is changing the game for good
articles.author: JULIA REMILLARD
articles.summary: The Powder Shampoo brand launched The Powder Conditioner, a powder-to-cream conditioner packaged in plastic-free aluminum bottles. The conditioner features earth-sourced ingredients like Rosemary, Bergamot, and Tamanu Oil and aims to reduce waste while providing high-performance haircare. The Hydrating Volume Conditioner and the Nourishing Repair Conditioner will be shoppable in carry-on-friendly sizes starting this month.

articles.title: Nectar Vs. DreamCloud: Which Popular Online Bed Is More Comfortable?
articles.author: McKenzie Dillon
articles.summary: Resident Home offers Nectar Classic and DreamCloud Hybrid Classic mattresses. The Nectar Classic is best for back, stomach, and combination sleepers seeking a contouring memory foam feel, while the DreamCloud Hybrid Classic suits side, back, and stomach sleepers wanting a cushioned, medium-firm feel. Both mattresses come with a 365-night trial and a lifetime limited warranty.

articles.title: 34 Products With Before-And-Afters That Will Give You FOMO
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduces firming neck and chest cream. Laneige launches Neo Blurring Powder. Clinique restocks Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. The Pink Stuff releases new "Sqeezy" sponge set. Catrice launches "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener in four shades. E.l.f introduces Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara.

articles.title: This weed vape is powerful, portable, and potent
articles.author: Rachelle Gordon
articles.summary: G Pen, owned by Grenco Science, launched the G Pen Dash +, a pocket-sized dry herb vaporizer with hybrid convection and conduction heating technology. This upgrade from the original Dash features a full-color digital display, customizable temperature settings, and a titanium chamber, priced at $149.95 MSRP and available for $73.99 at Headshop.com.

articles.title: SPF sale: This Supergoop! set is editor-approved and discounted at Nordstrom
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Supergoop! offers the Invisible Icons SPF Set, featuring the Unseen Sunscreen SPF 50 and Unseen Sunscreen Stick SPF 40, at a discounted price of $54 (originally $80) during the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale. The set includes the internet-famous Unseen Sunscreen SPF 50, known for its clear, velvety gel formula, and the Unseen Sunscreen Stick SPF 40, perfect for on-the-go application.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers rush to buy no-effort gadget that's £500 less than pricey version – it's perfect for cleaning your home
articles.author: Hana Carter
articles.summary: Aldi launched the Ambiano Robot Vacuum for £99.99, offering a cheaper alternative to Samsung's Jet Bot. Lidl also introduced the Parkside Robot Lawnmower for £199, designed for lawns up to 500-square metres.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers rush to buy no-effort gadget that's £500 less than pricey version – it's perfect for cleaning your home
articles.author: Hana Carter
articles.summary: Aldi launched the Ambiano Robot Vacuum for £99.99, a cheaper alternative to Samsung's Jet Bot. The Ambiano Robot Vacuum sweeps and mops floors, can be scheduled, features a three-stage suction adjustment, is app-controlled, and comes with a one-year warranty. Lidl also launched the Parkside Robot Lawnmower for £199, designed for lawns up to 500 square meters.

articles.title: JoySports Invitational Tournament: Ayuda signs on for 2025 edition
articles.summary: Ayudahub Limited launched Ayuda App in April 2025, a platform for booking services like cleaning, electrical repairs, and plumbing. The Ayuda App aims to connect users with certified service providers.

articles.title: Panda Express coming soon to North Platte
articles.author: Caitlyn Thomas
articles.summary: Panda Express has started construction on a new fast-casual Chinese restaurant location at 1101 S Dewey St. in North Platte, Nebraska. This will be the chain's 15th location in the state. Panda Express offers American-Chinese cuisine like their orange chicken.

articles.title: Entrepreneurship Gains Ground With Gen Z; Ultium Cells Invests in Battery Upgrade
articles.summary: Ultium Cells LLC will convert part of its Spring Hill battery plant to produce lithium iron phosphate cells. This demonstrates an update and potential enhancement of its battery technology.

articles.title: These Key Upgrades Will Be Packed Into The Pixel 10 Pro Fold
articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.summary: Google is expected to launch the Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, at the next 'Made By Google' event in August. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold will feature a Tensor G5 chipset, increased battery capacity of 5,015 mAh, and an upgraded IP68 protection rating, competing with Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold7 and Honor's Magic V.

articles.title: 4 Ways Businesses Should Be Using AI Chatbots Now
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: Jotform is using AI-powered chatbots for customer service, lead generation, search, and navigation. Photobucket has seen a three percent increase in customer satisfaction and a 17 percent improvement in first resolution times after implementing customer service-based AI agents. Chatbots also allow businesses to capture information upfront and pass along valuable data to marketing teams.

articles.title: Finally, a dev kit for designing on-device, mobile AI apps is here: Liquid AI's LEAP
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Liquid AI has released LEAP, a cross-platform SDK that simplifies the integration of small language models into mobile applications. Alongside LEAP, Liquid AI introduced Apollo, an iOS app designed for testing the models locally. The LEAP SDK includes a model library with compact models as small as 300MB.

articles.title: ‘Cyberpunk 2077' Update 2.3 Livestream, Possible Release Date, New Platform Launch
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: CDPR has announced the Cyberpunk 2077 2.3 update.

articles.title: Price of ‘self-cleaning' spot washer slashed by 40 per cent
articles.author: Beth Mahoney Shopping Writer
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 40% discount on the Vax SpotWash Duo Spot Cleaner, reducing the price from £139.99 to £84. The Vax SpotWash Duo Spot Cleaner comes with a 'messy clean up tool' and an 'every day cleaning tool', and includes a 'self cleaning' process. The Shark CarpetXpert Deep Carpet Cleaner EX150UK is also currently reduced from £249.99 to £179.99.

articles.title: Introducing the Galaxy Z Flip7 and Fold7: Samsung's most advanced foldables yet
articles.author: Tracy-Lynn Ruiters
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the Galaxy Z Flip7 and Galaxy Z Fold7, the newest additions to the Galaxy Z Series of foldable smartphones. The Galaxy Z Flip7 features a 4.1-inch Flex Window, upgraded Galaxy AI, 120Hz refresh rate on both screens, and a new Gemini Live voice assistant.

articles.title: I bought a bunch of cheap dresses from Amazon for summer — one was a cut above the rest
articles.author: Sarah Di Muro
articles.summary: The article reviews several Amazon dresses, including the MOLERANI Maxi Dress with Pockets and the MOLERANI Sleeveless Button-Down Dress, both praised for their comfort and flattering fit. Other dresses featured are the Famulily V-Neck Puff Sleeve Dress, WEACZZY Summer Dress, GRECERELLE V-Neck Maxi Dress and Courecrop Midi Corset Dress, each with specific pros and cons regarding style, fit, and maintenance.

articles.title: Samsung Is Running Seven Serious Deals For The Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone, and is offering several promotions, including double trade-in deals and discounts, to boost sales. The promotions include a 100 day try before you buy period, and discounts on trade-in prices.

articles.title: 39 Cheap But Luxe Products To Scratch Your Spendy Itch
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Various companies are introducing new products, including E.l.f.'s Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara and Halo Glow Liquid Filter, Eos' Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, Tree Hut's Desert Haze Shea Sugar Scrub and Moroccan Rose Whipped Shea Body Butter, and Jergens Natural Glow Firming Self Tanner Body Lotion. These products range from cosmetics to skincare, offering features like lash extension, dewy skin finish, moisturizing shave oil, exfoliating scrub, and self-tanning lotion, often compared favorably to higher-priced alternatives.

articles.title: Gmail Rolls Out Demand-Gen Ecommerce Ads in Promotions Tab
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google is piloting a new advertising format called 'Demand Gen' campaigns directly within Gmail's Promotions tab. This new format allows advertisers to showcase products and services, potentially driving increased sales and customer engagement. The goal is to make the advertising experience more beneficial for both users and businesses by making ads less intrusive and more aligned with user interests.

articles.title: Walmart selling new take on PB&J: Here's how you can spruce up your own peanut butter and jelly sandwich at home
articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: Jams, a Cleveland-born brand, launched a protein-packed, health-conscious version of the traditional PB&J sandwich. Launched on July 14, Jams sandwiches are now available in over 3,000 Walmart stores nationwide, each sandwich boasts 10 grams of protein and is free from seed oils, high-fructose corn syrup, artificial dyes, and flavors.

articles.title: WP Engine Launches AI Toolkit Empowering Website Owners to Drive Engagement and Growth
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: WP Engine launched a new AI toolkit for WordPress websites on July 15, 2025. The AI toolkit includes Smart Search AI, AI-Powered Recommendations, and Managed Vector Database. These tools aim to provide accessible AI capabilities to the WordPress community at scale.

articles.title: LambdaTest Becomes First in the Industry to Expand Browser Support for Mobile Exploratory and Automation on Virtual Devices
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: LambdaTest introduces expanded browser support for mobile exploratory and automation testing on virtual devices. The update enables manual and automation testing on alternative browsers such as Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Brave, DuckDuckGo, and Samsung Internet on Android, and Chromium, Firefox, Brave, and DuckDuckGo on iOS simulators, alongside Chrome and Safari.

articles.title: Seattle startup Zucca raises $5M to help food brands launch products faster with AI
articles.author: Taylor Soper
articles.summary: Zucca, a Seattle-based startup, launched its AI-powered software that helps food and beverage companies reimagine product development by managing all steps simultaneously in a centralized workspace. Built on models from OpenAI and Anthropic, Zucca generates new product concepts within minutes and is initially targeting mid-market CPG brands and R&D firms.

articles.title: Dyson's most popular cordless vacuum is $170 cheaper, but only until Saturday
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Dyson is offering limited-time summer sales in July 2025. The V8 Absolute Cordless Vacuum is discounted by $170, bringing the price down to $350. The Supersonic Hair Dryer is also on sale, reduced by $80 to $320, and includes multiple attachments to prevent heat damage and improve hair quality.

articles.title: Trupeer.ai lands $3M to turn screen recordings into professional product videos with AI
articles.author: Nickie Louise
articles.summary: Trupeer, an AI startup, has launched a platform that transforms rough screen recordings into studio-quality product videos using AI. This platform automates voiceovers, avatars, translations, and documentation to create polished videos quickly and easily. With $3 million in seed funding led by RTP Global, Trupeer aims to modernize how companies create and share product knowledge at scale.

articles.title: Drybar's best blowout brush is on sale for $51 off with two free styling samples during Nordstrom's Anniversary Sale
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Drybar's Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush is on sale for $104 during Nordstrom's Anniversary Sale. The brush uses Ionic Technology to smooth hair and is designed to create volume. Nordstrom is offering bonus styling gifts with the purchase of the Drybar product.

articles.title: Is the Samsung Galaxy M55 Worth It? Full Review with Specs and Performance
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy M55, a new smartphone in its M series. The Galaxy M55 features a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 7 Gen 1 chipset, and a 50MP main camera with OIS. It supports 45W fast charging and runs on Android 14 with One UI 6.1.

articles.title: UOVO Debuts "Breeze" Sneaker Line Alongside Launch of Direct-to-Consumer Website
articles.author: UOVO
articles.summary: An emerging footwear brand is launching versatile new trainers. This marks the brand's second shoe debut.

articles.title: My/Mochi launches Mochi Ice Cream Sandwiches
articles.author: Brian
articles.summary: My/Mochi has launched Mochi Ice Cream Sandwiches, featuring mochi ice cream balls between two soft cookies, targeting Gen Z consumers. The initial flavors, Strawberry Mochi Ice Cream and Sugar Cookie and Vanilla Mochi Ice Cream and Chocolate Chip Cookie, will be available as 2.45-oz single-serve sandwiches for $2.99, exclusively on Gopuff.

articles.title: Product Of The Week: Bread Beauty Supply Hair Gel
articles.author: Cierra Black
articles.summary: Bread Beauty Supply launched a new curl capturing gloss hair gel. The gel contains Yuzu extract, snow mushroom, and red algae, and is vegan, color-safe, cruelty, silicon, and paraben free. The gel retails for $26 and is praised for its ability to define, hydrate, and add shine to curls.

articles.title: How One Marketer Used QuillBot for a Day — and Transformed Their Entire Content Workflow
articles.author: satmin
articles.summary: QuillBot introduced several AI writing tools, including AI Paragraph Generator, AI Email Writer, AI Humanizer and AI Chat designed to enhance content creation workflows. These tools enable faster content generation, improved messaging, and a more human-like tone, supporting tasks like blog writing, email campaigns, and ad copy refinement. The services are intended to be a creative extension for marketers and content writers.

articles.title: I tried Lidl's £2.09 shower gel and it transformed my bathroom
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced the 'By Deluxe aromatic body cleanser,' a shower gel priced at £2.99. The product features an orange, petit grain, and jasmine scent and is packaged in a bottle with a pump. It aims to offer a luxurious shower experience at an affordable price, comparable to higher-end brands like Aesop.

articles.title: 5 Gadgets I never knew I needed until I got them
articles.author: Sarene Kloren
articles.summary: The article introduces five gadgets, including an electric egg boiler for easy egg preparation, battery-operated sensor lights for stairs to prevent tripping, and hairline powder for quick hair coverage. It also features a handheld milk frother for creamy foam and a magnetic double-sided window cleaner for hard-to-reach windows. Temu is mentioned as where some of these gadgets can be found.

articles.title: This 'super lightweight' laptop is normally $967, but it's on sale for under $300 on Amazon Canada
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: SGIN 15.6" Windows 11 Laptop is on sale on Amazon Canada with a 71% discount, bringing the price down to $280. The laptop features 4GB DDR4 memory, 128GB SSD storage, and a 15.6-inch HD screen, designed for tasks ranging from browsing to professional work.

articles.title: A Pokémon Presents, you say?
articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.summary: Preorders for physical copies of Pokémon Legends: Z-A will begin on July 23rd. A Pokémon Presents stream on July 22nd will reveal more information about the game.

articles.title: Jet Food Stores Expands Step 'n Wash Installations to Nine Stores, Upgrading Restrooms for Families with Children
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Jet Food Stores is expanding its partnership with Step 'n Wash and will install the built-in retractable step stool in five additional locations by July 1, 2025. This expansion will bring the total number of Jet stores offering this service to nine, making the restrooms more family-friendly.

articles.title: I drank a Malört-infused beer. Here's how it tastes (oof).
articles.author: Christian D'Andrea
articles.summary: New Belgium Brewing, in collaboration with Jeppsen's Malört, has launched a new product called the Voodoo Ranger x Malort IPA. This IPA is unique because only one can in a six-pack is infused with Malört, creating a game of chance for the consumer. The beer is described as having a peppermint motor oil and burnt hair flavor, but surprisingly working with the bitterness of the hops.

articles.title: Jet Food Stores Expands Step 'n Wash Installations to Nine Stores, Upgrading Restrooms for Families with Children
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: Jet Food Stores is expanding its partnership with Step 'n Wash, installing the built-in retractable step stool in five additional locations by July 1, 2025, bringing the total to nine stores. This introduction of Step 'n Wash aims to make restrooms more family-friendly, enhancing customer convenience.

articles.title: This future robot vacuum tech solves one key problem
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Stairrobotics is developing the Blue Chip, a stair-climbing robot vacuum prototype, intended for vacuum manufacturers to incorporate into their products. The mechanism allows robot vacuums to climb stairs one at a time without significantly increasing size or weight. Stairrobotics is pitching the technology to vacuum makers with European patents, aiming for mass adoption.

articles.title: Pricing AI In SMB SaaS: Balancing ROI And Affordability
articles.author: Itzik Levy
articles.summary: vcita, an SMB business management platform, is enhancing and expanding its AI solutions for SMBs. SaaS companies like Zoom, HubSpot, Microsoft, Salesforce, and Intercom are implementing different monetization models such as bundling AI features, offering premium add-ons (Microsoft Copilot, Salesforce Sales GPT and Service GPT), and pay-as-you-go pricing (Intercom's AI customer service bot) in their products. vcita uses beta testing and user interviews to understand and validate its product's propositions and confidently communicate AI's impact.

articles.title: Is Waterless Beauty Better for Your Skin Barrier?
articles.author: Sara Kitnick
articles.summary: The article introduces waterless beauty and solid skincare products, emphasizing their concentrated formulas and benefits for skin health. Ethique's Scalp Health Shampoo Bar utilizes oatmeal, karanja oil, and neem seed oil for calming inflammation. Solid cleansers and balms contain emollients and gentle surfactants, supporting the skin barrier effectively.

articles.title: ProductNow Raises $6M to Launch the AI-Native Stack for Product Teams
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: ProductNow announced a $6 million seed round led by Sierra Ventures. This funding will support ProductNow, the AI-native operating system designed for product teams that unifies fragmented product workflows into coordinated execution.

articles.title: ProductNow Raises $6M to Launch the AI-Native Stack for Product Teams
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: ProductNow has launched its AI-native operating system for product teams. The agentic platform unifies product workflows, turning business intent into coordinated execution, and is designed around collaborative agents to replace fragmented tools and manual workflows. The company also announced it raised $6 million in seed funding.

articles.title: Everything We Know About the Samsung Z Fold 7 So Far
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, featuring a slimmer design, stronger hinge, and a larger outer screen. This new model includes Samsung's first 200MP camera and is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Elite processor. The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is available for pre-order and is aimed at users who require multitasking and advanced photography capabilities.

articles.title: Mizuno unveils Pro S-1 irons
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: Mizuno has introduced the Pro S-1. This indicates a new product release from Mizuno.

articles.title: Underground 'Thing Pipes' Will Change Delivery Forever
articles.author: G. B. Rango
articles.summary: Pipedream Labs is launching a network of tunnels serviced by autonomous robots to deliver anything. This new service aims to provide automated delivery solutions.

articles.title: Friday Harbor launches open APIs to give mortgage lenders and vendors more integration flexibility
articles.author: Friday Harbor
articles.summary: Friday Harbor launched a new API suite, Origination Assistant, powered by AI, designed to integrate with any LOS or POS. This suite aims to help lenders automate different loan options. Lenders can now customize customer communication by integrating the Origination Assistant with other applications.

articles.title: Visual AI Tools: The Future Of Marketing Content Creation
articles.author: Bernard May
articles.summary: Midjourney, Gemini, Runway, Kaiber, and ElevenLabs are companies offering AI tools that enhance visual content creation. Midjourney is used for custom image generation, Gemini for quick image creation within a chat thread, Runway for realistic video creation, Kaiber for budget-friendly video asset generation, and ElevenLabs for voice cloning to create AI avatar voices. These tools enable marketers to create videos and images for promotional purposes or product demonstrations.

articles.title: Mike's Hot Honey Launches First National Campaign with a Cinematic Drizzle of Sweet Heat
articles.author: Mike's Hot Honey
articles.summary: Mike's Hot Honey is launching its first national advertising campaign called "Drizzle the Mike's." This campaign is a tribute to the brand's fanbase and the experience of tasting Mike's Hot Honey.

articles.title: Why thousands of people are buying this $320 Dyson hair dryer while it's on sale this summer
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a discount on the Supersonic Hair Dryer, reducing the price from $400 to $320. The Dyson V7 Advanced Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is also on sale at Walmart for $250, down from $400. These deals provide opportunities for consumers to purchase Dyson products at reduced prices.

articles.title: Perplexity AI's Aravind Srinivas warns aspiring entrepreneurs of tech giants copying successful ideas: ‘Learn to live with that fear'
articles.author: Sneha Kumari
articles.summary: Perplexity launched an 'answer engine' designed to deliver accurate, streamlined responses using 'real-time' web searches. OpenAI is reportedly gearing up to launch an AI-powered web browser, embedding ChatGPT-like functions, that could directly rival Google Chrome.

articles.title: £34 ‘beautiful summer dress' from New Look ‘fits really well' and is ‘so flattering'
articles.author: Jessica Brunt
articles.summary: New Look is offering the Gingham Check Tie Neck Midi Dress, available in multiple colors and sizes 6-22, with tie detail at the bust and puff sleeves. The dress is priced at £34 for black and green versions, while the red version is reduced to £25 and customers have praised its fit and flattering style.

articles.title: Claude AI now integrates with Notion, Canva, Figma, Stripe and more in major Anthropic update
articles.summary: Anthropic has upgraded its Claude assistant with a new directory of integrated tools, enabling connections to platforms like Notion, Canva, Stripe, and Figma. This update allows Claude to access user-approved services and data, facilitating tasks such as generating release notes from Linear or creating branded Canva posts, enhancing its capabilities as a digital co-worker.

articles.title: These 32 Things From Amazon's 'Most Wished For' Section Are Actually Perfect For Summer
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Amazon showcases a collection of trending and popular products in its "Most Wished For" section, including items like solar-powered lights, mosquito repellent devices, and vegan skincare mist. Additionally, it features new releases, such as Laneige's Glaze Craze tinted lip serum and the Shark FlexBreeze HydroGo Fan.

articles.title: Zara McDermott's tool that gives her 'fresh blow dry' at home
articles.author: Katrina Chilver
articles.summary: ghd launched the Duet Blowdry, a 2-in-1 blow-dry brush, discounted at Boots. The brush promises smooth, voluminous results with consistent heat and 50% more shine. Alternative brushes are available from Revolution Haircare, Beauty Works and Drybar.

articles.title: Panda Express 'Orange Chicken Kitchen' NYC Pop-Up Experience
articles.author: 쓸모있는 세금상식
articles.summary: Panda Express, creator of 'The Original Orange Chicken', celebrated 'National Orange Chicken Day' by launching an 'Orange Chicken Kitchen' Pop-Up Experience in New York on July 14th, 2025. The pop-up aimed to promote their signature 'Original Orange Chicken' product.

articles.title: Lidl's Jo Malone handwash dupes are back in stores – they're £34 cheaper than the real thing & ‘smell exactly the same'
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: Lidl is re-introducing its Deluxe Luxury Handwash, which is a dupe of Jo Malone's hand wash, to its stores. The product is available with a discount through the Lidl Plus app, reducing the price to £1.69. The hand wash is available in stores.

articles.title: Tesla Model Y Launched In India: Check Price, Range, Features, And More
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Tesla launched the Model Y and its inaugural showroom in India.

articles.title: Cordless vacuum with 'super strong suction' gets £100 price slash in limited time deal
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a limited-time deal on the Avalsor Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, which features a 550W motor, 180,000 RPM suction power, LED lights, and a 65-minute runtime. Additionally, deals are available for the SunSare Cordless Vacuum Cleaner and the Shark Anti Hair Wrap & Flexology Cordless Vacuum Cleaner through Amazon and Argos respectively.

articles.title: Popeyes® has officially opened its doors at The Junction, Antrim
articles.author: Gavin Walker
org: The Junction Retail and Leisure Park
articles.summary: Popeyes opened a new restaurant in Antrim, Northern Ireland, featuring its full menu including the Chicken Sandwich range, Hot Wings, and Original Southern Biscuits and Gravy. The restaurant is also launching the new Saucin' Boneless and Hot Wings range and a breakfast menu, available from 8:00am to 10:00am, with a breakfast meal deal offered through the Popeyes UK app.

articles.title: Bringing Minecraft to Life: A Plea for a Comprehensive Animation Overhaul
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: Archyde launched a groundbreaking artificial intelligence platform. The AI platform is designed for complex data analysis and empowers organizations to derive actionable intelligence. It allows professionals to navigate and interpret intricate data patterns.

articles.title: Meet the New Nextdoor
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nextdoor Holdings, Inc. has launched a redesigned Nextdoor platform featuring Alerts, News, and Faves. The company is also introducing advertising services in Canada, enabling businesses to connect with local communities.

articles.title: Video: Chaos on SpiceJet flight as AC goes off, two flyers try to enter cockpit
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 foldable phones at the Samsung Unpacked event in New York. OnePlus's new phones, Nord 5 and Nord CE5, are also reviewed.

articles.title: AI-powered web browsers want to help people save time. But are they effective?
articles.author: Jasmine Cui
articles.summary: Perplexity AI launched Comet, an AI-powered web browser available to its $200-per-month tier users, designed as a 'thought partner' to automate tasks like booking reservations and planning trips. The browser integrates AI into the web interface, differing from Google's Gemini in Chrome, and will eventually be free for use after an invite-based rollout over the summer. Other companies such as Expedia and Walmart have also launched similar AI travel and shopping assistants.

articles.title: Huella's AIgnite promises to turbocharge open web creativity
articles.summary: Huella Services has launched AIgnite, an AI-driven ad intelligence platform designed to transform creative asset performance across the open web. AIgnite aims to improve click-through rates and campaign performance by combining native advertising engagement with display scalability, utilizing real-time AI to optimize creative in-flight. The platform also boasts faster identification of winning combinations and extended campaign performance windows.

articles.title: If You Want To Get Better At Doing Your Hair, These 43 Products Are Game Changers
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new and updated hair care products designed to improve hair health and styling. Highlights include Briogeo's Heat Protectant Crème, JVN Air Dry Cream, Revlon one-step hair dryer and volumizer, Wavytalk blow dryer, Color Wow's anti-humidity spray and Money Mist leave-in conditioner, L'Oreal Paris rinse-out lamellar water treatment, Fanola 'No Yellow' purple shampoo and L'Oreal root-concealing spray. These products range from heat protection and styling aids to treatments and color maintenance solutions.

articles.title: You can now edit your Canva designs using Claude chatbot
articles.summary: Anthropic's Claude AI has been integrated with Canva, allowing users to create and edit designs by chatting. The integration supports various design tasks like creating presentations, resizing images, and summarizing Canva Docs and Presentations. This makes Claude the first AI assistant to support Canva design workflows through MCP.

articles.title: This robot vac might be the best at mopping I've ever seen
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Dreame is launching the Aqua 10 Ultra Roller Complete, a new robot vacuum and mop featuring a self-rinsing roller mop, FluffRoll for grout cleaning, and AutoSeal roller guard for carpets. The robot includes AI-powered obstacle avoidance, strong suction, and Matter integration and is slated for release at the end of 2025.

articles.title: Tested: I'd let this AI-powered video doorbell be my digital gatekeeper
articles.summary: Swann has launched the SwannBuddy 4K Video Doorbell, an upgrade to its previous SwannBuddy Video Doorbell. The new doorbell features improved resolution and image quality, addressing a key weakness of the original product. The SwannBuddy 4K captures video at 2032 x 3712 pixels at 15 frames per second, with a 165-degree vertical viewing angle.

articles.title: Samsung's Sally Hyesoon Jeong shares insights on developing OneUI 8 interface for the Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced One UI 8, optimized for foldable devices like the Galaxy Z Fold 7, alongside bar-type phones and tablets. One UI 8 will emphasize large-screen multitasking and AI features like AI Results View and Drag & Drop, and integrate Google's Gemini Live with multimodal capabilities, creating a voice centric interface.

articles.title: Is AI Making Advertising Easier, But Marketing Getting Harder?
articles.author: Abdullah Fikri Ashri
articles.summary: Open AI's ChatGPT enables users to design ad concepts, while Google launched AI-based marketing features like AI Max for Search, Asset Studio, Ads in AI Overviews, and YouTube Creator Partnership integrated into Google Ads and Analytics. Meta's Advantage+ feature assists advertisers in targeting audiences and increasing sales on Facebook and Instagram. These AI-driven solutions represent new products/features aiming to improve advertising capabilities for businesses.

articles.title: 2025 Renault Master price and specs
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: CarExpert is offering hundreds of new car deals. Customers can browse the deals to potentially score a great deal.

articles.title: "Foreign customers directly enter their destinations after experiencing the product. These days, it'..
articles.author: Ahn Seojin
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7, with pre-sales starting on the 15th. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 features a thinner and lighter design, an improved display, and enhanced hardware performance with the "Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy" processor; its price has increased compared to the previous model, while the Galaxy Z Flip 7 price remains the same. Samsung is also conducting online pre-booking and offering a free storage upgrade to 512GB for customers who pre-purchase the 256GB models.

articles.title: Artificial intelligence (AI) agent Studio Dalpa announced on the 15th that it has solved the problem..
articles.author: A Letter
articles.summary: Studio Dalpa's AI search solution was introduced to Curly's e-commerce platform to address issues with search accuracy. An A/B test revealed that Dalpa's AI increased shopping basket conversion rates by 10%, leading to a notable increase in sales. Curly official confirmed that the search can be directly linked to practical business performance beyond simple UX.

articles.title: What's new on Instagram search? AI-generated summaries by Meta
articles.summary: Instagram has introduced a new AI-powered feature that creates short summaries of profiles and topics in search results, providing users with a quick overview. Meta is also allowing public posts from business and creator accounts to appear in Google search results starting July 10, increasing content visibility. This feature aims to make Instagram a more effective discovery tool by providing concise information alongside visuals.

articles.title: Good News: Tineco's Prime Day Deals Extended Until July 20!
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tineco is extending its Prime Day offers until July 20, 2025, providing discounts on its smart cleaning devices, including FLOOR ONE S7 Stretch Ultra, FLOOR ONE STRETCH S6, FLOOR ONE S9 Artist, PURE ONE STATION 5 Plus, and CARPET ONE Cruiser. The offers are available on the Tineco Amazon Store, with an additional 6% discount using the promo code TINPRIME25.

articles.title: Meet Ani: Elon Musk's new AI anime girl companion with an 'NSFW' mode
articles.summary: xAI launched Ani and Rudy, new AI companions for Grok, exclusively for SuperGrok subscribers.  Users can access these companions by updating their Grok app and enabling them in settings. The company also hints at future AI companions like "Chad" and an unnamed girl and seem to be collaborating with Animation Inc. for the development of the 3D models.

articles.title: Regional snacks travel far with 10-min delivery
articles.author: Supriya Roy
articles.summary: Regional food and beverage brands such as Sweet Karam Coffee, Two Brothers Organic Farms, and Chitale Bandhu Mithaiwale are leveraging quick commerce platforms like Zepto, Blinkit, Instamart, and BigBasket to expand beyond their home markets.  This strategy involves offering bundled packs and smaller sizes, leading to increased visibility and sales outside their original regions. BigBasket has also seen a growth in regional SKUs like Nylon Sev, Misal, and Ujjain Sev.

articles.title: Tecno POVA 7 series wins global awards
articles.author: AKANI CHAUKE
articles.summary: TECNO's POVA 7 smartphone series has been awarded the Golden Award at the New York Product Design Awards and the Platinum Award at the London Design Awards. The phone features AI-powered tools like real-time translation and AI-enhanced imaging, and has a high-performance chipset for gaming. It also boasts long-lasting batteries and fast charging.

articles.title: Samsung to deliver advanced smartphone experience
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has unveiled the Galaxy Z Fold7, a new foldable smartphone that combines Galaxy AI with powerful hardware. This device features an ultra-thin and light design, a larger display, and an enhanced camera with AI-enhanced imaging. The Galaxy Z Fold7 aims to provide a seamless on-the-go experience with improved productivity and immersive viewing.

articles.title: Elegant Fine Caviar is Malaysian-owned caviar from a sturgeon farm in China
articles.author: Abirami Durai
articles.summary: Elegant Fine Caviar, a Malaysian brand, launched its range of caviar products, including Prestia, Luxoria, and Imperial Astria. These caviars are derived from different sturgeon species and offer unique flavor profiles. The brand plans to introduce Bari, a Siberian sturgeon caviar, and expand its market presence in Malaysia and Asia.

articles.title: LG Electronics (CEO Cho Joo-wan)'s complex washing and drying machine "LG Wash Tower" has been selec..
articles.author: Lee Deok-Ju
articles.summary: LG Electronics' LG Wash Tower, a complex washing and drying machine, has been recognized as the 'best washing and drying' product by leading US and UK media. The product has been praised for its AI Core Tech, ease of use, laundry performance, energy efficiency and low noise. The product was first introduced in 2020.

articles.title: Woman reveals $3 Temu product solves common winter car problem
articles.author: Claudia Poposki
articles.summary: Temu is selling a $3 car side mirror squeegee that is receiving positive feedback from customers on TikTok. Users are praising the product for its effectiveness in clearing frosted-over mirrors and its overall usefulness.

articles.title: Aldi's new £10 gadget 'so handy' for making notes is 'life hack'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Aldi launched its new "Life Hacks range" which includes a Mini Thermal Printer for printing photos and notes, a Smart Kettle with app-controlled temperature settings, and a Robot Vacuum Cleaner. The range became available in stores from July 13, with limited stock.

articles.title: 38 Random Products To Buy If You Enjoy Spoiling Yourself
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Olay introduces Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration. Dossier launches "Ambery Vanilla" perfume as an affordable alternative to YSL's Black Opium. Levi's releases Cinch Baggy Jeans with an adjustable band. Cosrx launches Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence for soothing and repairing skin. Brumate introduces Era 40-ounce water bottle with a locking feature. Lawless launches "Forget The Filler" lip product in various flavors. E.l.f. introduces Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops, a skincare item with hibiscus complex and hyaluronic acid. Bissell launches a multipurpose portable cleaner. Lego releases a version of a Disney Parks parade. LilyAna Naturals launches Eye Cream designed to decrease puffiness and dark circles.

articles.title: Youfoodz delivers fresh brand platform ‘Real food for the real world' with Saatchi and Saatchi Aus
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Youfoodz, in partnership with Saatchi & Saatchi Australia, has launched a new brand platform called 'Real food for the real world'. This initiative aims to provide quick, nourishing meal solutions for busy consumers, supported by a large-scale brand media campaign across various channels led by Spark Foundry Australia.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works to debut new store
articles.author: Reilly Mahon
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is opening a new 4,200 square foot store at Lakeport Commons in Sioux City, located at 5001 Sergeant Road. Construction on the store, the second Bath & Body Works location in Sioux City, began in early June, with the opening planned for later this summer.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works to debut new store
articles.author: Reilly Mahon
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is opening a new store at the Lakeport Commons in Sioux City, taking over the former Versona Accessories location. Construction began in early June, with the store expected to open this summer. This will be the second Bath & Body Works store in Sioux City, complementing the existing location in the Southern Hills Mall.

articles.title: 33 Reliable Products On Amazon's "Famous" List
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new products. Eos is introducing its Cashmere Body Oil, an extension of their popular lotion. Olay is launching a Super Serum Body Wash based on their facial serum. L'Oreal Paris has a new Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray. Monday Haircare is offering a Dry Shampoo with keratin. Palmer's is releasing Cocoa Butter Skin Therapy Cleansing Facial Oil.  There is also introduction of products from brands like Dae's Hair, Neutrogena, La Roche-Posay, Levi's, Medicube

articles.title: Bath & Body Works Fans Celebrate Return of ‘Can't Live Without' Cozy Scent
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is expanding its wellness ingredient-led collection with three new scents: milk, honey, and espresso. These scents are available in body lotion, body butter, moisturizing body wash, and fine fragrance mist. The milk scent, featuring notes of sugared oats and whipped milk, is a fan favorite.

articles.title: Rinse & Repeat's vision is to revolutionise the traditional laundry experience for local businesses, by offering luxury, first-of-its kind laundry services and facilities.
articles.summary: Rinse & Repeat is redefining commercial laundry service for the aviation industry. They use "cutting-edge technology" and VIP style customer service to create "extraordinary experiences".

articles.title: LG WashTower wins multiple accolades as best washer-dryer in U.S. reviews
articles.author: Chun Byung-Soo
articles.summary: LG Electronics' LG WashTower, a combination washer and dryer, has received acclaim from various media outlets, including Forbes and Good Housekeeping, for its user-friendly design, washing performance, and energy efficiency. Introduced in 2020, the LG WashTower features AI DD Motor technology and has been significantly enhanced with AI Time Sensing and AI Time Guidance features for improved user experience.

articles.title: Next shoppers say they want to buy 'perfect' £9 t-shirts in several colours
articles.author: Mel King
articles.summary: Next introduced multi-packs of Cap Sleeve T-Shirts due to their popularity. The five-pack is priced at £35, reducing the cost per shirt to £7. Mark & Spencer is offering a duo of its Pure Cotton T-Shirts for £15, and Roman's Plain Stretch Cotton Jersey T-Shirts are available at £18 apiece.

articles.title: Canon Showcases AI-Driven Business Solutions at "THINK BIG
articles.author: Dayang Norazhar
articles.summary: Canon Hong Kong launched the imageFORCE series, multi-function devices with AI-driven classification and predictive maintenance, at the 'THINK BIG' event. They also introduced AI Genie 2, an AI assistant which integrates with MCP to enhance decision-making and automate operational workflows. Canon also showcased other AI-driven solutions including enterprise-grade IT security solution, ESET, BIPO and Workplace AI to address growing cyber-risks and provide comprehensive human resource management system and Workplace Sustainable-Tech.

articles.title: 30 Products For Carry-On Only Traveling
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article highlights various products designed to simplify travel packing and organization. These include items like the Cadence Capsules for toiletries, the Subtl Beauty Stack for makeup, the Alleyoop Pen Pal for makeup touchups and a 3-in-1 travel razor. These products aim to minimize space usage and provide convenient solutions for travelers.

articles.title: Nut Studio Breaks Barriers to Local AI Deployment – No Coding Required
articles.author: The Lawton Constitution
articles.summary: iMyFone has officially launched a new product or service as of July 14, 2025, in New York, N.Y.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 and Flip 4 Receive One UI 8 Updates
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the One UI 8 update for the Galaxy Z Fold 4 and Galaxy Z Flip 4, bringing enhanced customization options, improved camera experience, and productivity boosts.  Key improvements include enhanced Nightography features, refined image processing algorithms, redesigned widgets, and multi-window improvements.

articles.title: Popeyes is launching a new sauce for a limited time! What is it?
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: Popeyes has launched a new Signature Sauce, a flavorful blend of spices served in a newly designed container, and chicken wraps, featuring a breaded chicken strip with various toppings in a tortilla. The Signature Sauce is a permanent menu item and the chicken wraps are available in classic, spicy, and honey mustard flavors.

articles.title: Just 30 Cheap Products That'll Have You Jumping For Joy
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduces a shea butter-infused cream-to-powder multistick usable as blush, lipstick, and eyeshadow. Additionally, Orly releases a Bonder base coat which helps manicures stay fresh and intact for longer. Flip It! offers a bottle emptying kit to maximize product usage.

articles.title: Inovat wins FAB forward Fintech Challenge, run by First Abu Dhabi Bank and Mastercard
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Inovat introduced a fully digital value-added tax (VAT) refund solution designed to provide a seamless experience for travelers.

articles.title: Tesco shoppers 'love' �22.50 summer dress that's 'very flattering'
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Tesco's F&F Clothing is selling a new dress. Customers are reacting positively, describing the dress as 'beautiful' and 'amazing'.

articles.title: It's Time To Put AI Agents To Work
articles.author: Clint Boulton
articles.summary: Dell and NVIDIA have created an eBook to help leaders understand Agentic AI. To facilitate Agentic AI adoption, Dell AI Factory with NVIDIA, is a framework that incorporates services, AI software and infrastructure. NVIDIA NeMO and NIM microservices provides developers the tools they need to build and fuel agents.

articles.title: The New LG OLED TV Has the Brightest Screen I've Ever Tested
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: LG's OLED G5 enhances the gaming experience of Call of Duty Black Ops 6, providing an eye-popping visual experience.

articles.title: Your OnePlus 13 Will Get a Dedicated AI 'Mind Space' in Update Rolling Out Now
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: OnePlus has developed a flagship AI feature. This feature will be available on select phones soon.

articles.title: GA4Hell Unveils All-in-One AI SEO Platform for Generative Search, LLM Optimization, and GEO
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: GA4Hell, an AI-first SEO innovator, launched its comprehensive SEO platform on July 15, 2025. The platform is designed to increase brand visibility across Google, ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity. The new service focuses on AI SEO, GEO, and LLM optimization.

articles.title: Marketing Signals Unveils AI Search Optimization Service to Elevate Digital Discoverability
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: An online performance marketing agency has launched its AI Search Optimisation service. This new offering aims to help brands succeed in the changing AI-driven search environment, as traditional SEO and paid channels adapt to AI Overviews and LLMs.

articles.title: The brand-new Laneige x Baskin-Robbins Lip Sleeping Mask smells like the ultimate summertime treat
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Laneige introduced a new lip sleeping mask as part of their product lineup. This launch is a collaboration expected to be popular.

articles.title: How to Buy Los Angeles Chargers New Alternate Jerseys: Shop Navy "Super Chargers", Gold "Chargers ...
articles.author: Newsweek
articles.summary: The Los Angeles Chargers unveiled new alternate jerseys for the upcoming NFL season. These jerseys are expected to be popular among fans.

articles.title: Myntra Now: Get stunning dresses delivered in 30 minutes across Delhi NCR; Top 8 picks
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Myntra introduces Myntra Now, a new service providing 30-minute delivery of women's dresses within Delhi NCR. The service offers a range of styles, including florals, ethnic midis, maxis, and shirt dresses.

articles.title: Nectar Vs. DreamCloud: Which Popular Online Bed Is More Comfortable?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Testers compared Nectar and DreamCloud mattresses, evaluating their firmness, feel, and support. This detailed comparison helps consumers choose between the two products.

articles.title: 'I'd buy it again' – this $39 collapsible Joseph Joseph gem stashes away seamlessly in small spaces, makes light work of chores and shoppers rave about it
articles.summary: Joseph Joseph introduces the Hold-All Max Collapsible Washing Laundry Basket Bag, a lightweight, durable, and collapsible laundry bag. This bag features built-in handles for easy carrying, moisture-resistant material, and the ability to fold flat for storage.
